title: Scarf, early 20th century
markings: Ribbon tag attached: "Frances Morris Collection" and "The Slater Memorial Museum"
description: Narrow length of batik in brown, dark blue, white, and tan.Tumpal motif (row of isosceles triangles) at ends and large sawat or mironj motif (wings of Garuda, mount of Vishnu) throughout field. Small mount meru motif (three-humped line) mixed in with smaller short curving lines in ground. Thin border with geometric pattern surrounding field with another thin geometric border at the sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Scarf, early 20th century.
early 20th century. Medium: silk
Technique: wax resist (batik). Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-18.
